channel.title: Trouble Shooting on /home/lunarxlark/.config/blog
channel.description: Recent content in Trouble Shooting on /home/lunarxlark/.config/blog

item.title: dockerでmysqlイメージ起動時に起きたエラー [ERROR] secure_file_priv
item.description: MySQL ERROR 1290 (HY000) –secure-file-priv option - Stack Overflow mysql> load data infile 'account.csv' into table authapi.account fields terminated by ',' enclosed by '"'; ERROR 1290 (HY000): The MySQL server is running with the --secure-file-priv option so it cannot execute this statement mysql> SELECT @@GLOBAL.secure_file_priv; +---------------------------+ | @@GLOBAL.secure_file_priv | +---------------------------+ | /var/lib/mysql-files/ | +---------------------------+
